TopicTitle: Please help!!! My stations get Destroyed no matter what when I get close for Rendezveu

Articles.Content:
Hi,

So Every time I get close in a rendezveu my station gets all crazy and explodes, or all the sudden my craft accelerates with no control or engines up and there is no way to stop it. So the first time this happened I terminated the station and re made the station and still happened. I will upload the Save file so that somebody can troubleshoot and hopefully fix. I'm stuck because of this problem and my reputation went from 500 to -129 because I terminated the last station. Please Help.

To recreate, just launch anything to the station in the save file and you will understand, it happens every time. And all of my mods are up to day to my knowledge. Also I don't get any logs or crash.

And there is already the craft that I wanted to dock about 800m from the station in the savefile.

Mod list:

ATM 1.0 basic x86

Adjustable Landing Gear- 1.0.4

BAM 1.1.1

Turbo Nisu Reloaded

VOID 0.16.4

Here with the save file are the gamedata folder too...

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/hd8k0zacmsvxqm8/AAC4OJg5jGQ8ETLtXtj1wA-8a?dl=0

A better way to describe my problem is like if there was a force field around the 200m range of the station the will make the craft stop moving and the station accelerate towards kerbin.

Edited January 9, 2015 by Andrewmacor
Needed more info
Apologize for my spelling english is my second language

Well, your log file is as confusing to read as one would expect from that many mods. It's also spammed with a ton of intermittent nullrefs. On top of that, the log was uploaded while KSP was still running.

There's definitely something going nutso, but I can't figure out what it is in that mess.

Update to the latest KJR dll from github, the current release has... issues. Namely, sticking certain parts to worldspace on load, this can be somewhat spectacular.

For times like this, I recommend S.A.V.E., cause, ya know, backups are good

Edited January 9, 2015 by steve_v
links
